recipe.title: Basic Sugar Glaze
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups (150 grams) confectioners' sugar, sifted to remove any lumps
instructions: 1. Place the sugar in a medium bowl and slowly stir in the milk and vanilla, a little at a time, to make a smooth, pourable glaze.
